com.vaadin.fluent.api

Interface FluentScrollable<THIS extends FluentScrollable<THIS>>

  • Type Parameters:
    THIS - Self-referential generic THIS
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.vaadin.server.Scrollable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FluentPanel<THIS>, FluentWindow<THIS>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FPanel, FWindow

    public interface FluentScrollable<THIS extends FluentScrollable<THIS>>
extends com.vaadin.server.Scrollable
    The base interface for fluent versions of Scrollable
    See Also:
    Scrollable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default THIS withScrollLeft(int scrollLeft)
      Sets scroll left offset.
      default THIS withScrollTop(int scrollTop)
      Sets scroll top offset.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.vaadin.server.Scrollable

        getScrollLeft, getScrollTop, setScrollLeft, setScrollTop

    • Method Detail

      • withScrollLeft

        default THIS withScrollLeft(int scrollLeft)
        Sets scroll left offset.

        Scrolling offset is the number of pixels this scrollable has been scrolled right.

        Parameters:
        scrollLeft - the xOffset.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
        See Also:
        Scrollable.setScrollLeft(int)

      • withScrollTop

        default THIS withScrollTop(int scrollTop)
        Sets scroll top offset.

        Scrolling offset is the number of pixels this scrollable has been scrolled down.

        The scrolling position is limited by the current height of the content area. If the position is below the height, it is scrolled to the bottom. However, if the same response also adds height to the content area, scrolling to bottom only scrolls to the bottom of the previous content area.

        Parameters:
        scrollTop - the yOffset.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
        See Also:
        Scrollable.setScrollTop(int)
